title: Style: Adidas Stan Smith II TF Collection
body:
#gallery-1 { margin: auto; } #gallery-1 .gallery-item { float: left; margin-top: 10px; text-align: center; width: 50%; } #gallery-1 img { border: 2px solid #cfcfcf; } #gallery-1 .gallery-caption { margin-left: 0; } /\* see gallery\_shortcode() in wp-includes/media.php \*/

Missing Attachment

Missing Attachment

  

The new TF collection takes the classic shapes of the iconic 80’s high top and mixes it up with a zip feature.

When you undo the zip you’re left with a low top shoe in a different and contrasting design, still in Adidas signature blue and black colours. An ingenious idea from Adidas leaves you with two functioning pairs of shoes, with the letters TF used to symbolize transform.

The shoes are now available in select stores, and I personally think they are some of the best kicks I have seen in a long time.

Buy the trainers [here.](http://adidastrainers.org.uk/adidas-stan-smith-80s-tf-5/)
